3 Compound Documents and OLE Controls in DUIM

3.3 About the DUIM-OLE-Control library

The DUIM-OLE-Control library allows you to build an OLE Control using DUIM to define its user interface elements. Using DUIM-OLE-Control is similar to using DUIM-OLE-Server; this reflects the fact that OLE Controls share some of the characteristics of OLE compound document servers, such as being embeddable.

Because DUIM-OLE-Control is integrated tightly with the standard DUIM programming model, you do not need to know anything about the low-level Functional Developer OLE/COM API or Microsoft's OLE/COM API to use it.

If you want to write an OLE control using Functional Developer's direct Win32 API instead of DUIM, you should use the OLE-Control-Framework library.
